PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14252018-11-21
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of ELAINE DOYLE, full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), for the period she is acting as Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office), effective March 19, 2018, until such time as a new Assistant Deputy Chairperson (Montréal Regional Office) is designated.
AttachmentsAttachment
